Lead to your army to victory in Kings of War

The game of legendary fantasy battles!

It's Time For War

Kings of War is the game of fantasy battles fought between mighty armies. Build and collect an army of miniatures and take part in epic conflicts and legendary battles across a fantasy realm.

Find out more
Through The Ages

An ancient fantasy realm beset by war, choose your army, gather your forces and unleash them on the world. Will you be a force for good, or will you lead the forces of darkness?

Discover
The Barracks

Join fantastic, fanatical generals from around the world. Get top tips and tactics on our forum, check out the awesomely painted miniatures in the Gallery and join in with all the latest updates on Socal media!
